Chapter 821 - The Same Goal, Different People

The Allheaven Blood Furnace!

Su Yi exclaimed, “How did that treasure wind up in the pawnshop?”

To the best of his knowledge, the Allheaven Blood Furnace was a supreme treasure of the Wilds’ peak Demonist faction, Red Dust Demon Palace. Its monstrous power could easily wash entire landscapes in blood and refine every living creature within them.

Red Dust Demon Palace had used this treasure to refine the blood and valiant spirits of countless mighty foes. It was a famed demonic weapon amongst the Wilds’ demonic cultivators.

The Touch of Gold Pavilion had once appraised the Wilds’ demonic treasures. They decided that although the Allheaven Blood Furnace was top quality, it was too murderous, and using it risked inviting divine punishment, so their appraisal of it wasn’t at all good.

“My mistress brought it back. She said she’d fought an old devil of Red Dust Demon Palace, and that this was her trophy,” explained the old pawnbroker. “During that battle, my mistress damaged the treasure.
